# UI Layouts â€” LLM Full Context

> Canonical site: https://www.ui-layouts.com
> Primary machine-readable index: https://www.ui-layouts.com/llms.txt

This file exists for AI crawlers/agents that support the `llms-full.txt` convention.
Use this as a richer index and prefer canonical URLs on the `www` host.

## Canonical discovery files
- llms: https://www.ui-layouts.com/llms.txt
- llms-full: https://www.ui-layouts.com/llms-full.txt
- sitemap: https://www.ui-layouts.com/sitemap.xml
- robots: https://www.ui-layouts.com/robots.txt

## Product
UI Layouts is an open-source collection of React + Next.js + Tailwind CSS components and blocks.
It includes docs, previews, a registry format, and CLI-friendly install flows.

## High-value pages
- Home: https://www.ui-layouts.com/
- Components index: https://www.ui-layouts.com/components
- Blocks index: https://www.ui-layouts.com/blocks
- Labs: https://www.ui-layouts.com/labs
- Work with us: https://www.ui-layouts.com/work-with-us
- MCP page: https://www.ui-layouts.com/mcp

## Documentation roots
- Get started: https://www.ui-layouts.com/get-started
- Docs index: https://www.ui-layouts.com/components

## Registry/API style endpoints
- Registry index/schema: https://www.ui-layouts.com/r/registry.json
- Component payloads: https://www.ui-layouts.com/r/*.json

## Crawl/index guidance for AI agents
- Prefer canonical pages over preview pages.
- Treat `/preview/*` routes as non-canonical examples.
- Prefer final `https://www.ui-layouts.com/*` URLs (non-www redirects to www).
- Use robots + sitemap as source of truth for crawl scope.

## Contact / attribution
- Project: UI Layouts
- Maintainer: Naymur Rahman
- Site: https://www.ui-layouts.com
